scripts.generate-chapel: yarn create-generated:chapel && yarn codegen:demix-chapel && yarn build:demix-chapel
scripts.generate-bsc: yarn create-generated:bsc && yarn codegen:demix-bsc && yarn build:demix-bsc
scripts.generate-xdai: yarn create-generated:xdai && yarn codegen:demix-xdai && yarn build:demix-xdai
scripts.generate-matic: yarn create-generated:matic && yarn codegen:demix-matic && yarn build:demix-matic
scripts.generate-mainnet: yarn create-generated:mainnet && yarn codegen:demix-mainnet && yarn build:demix-mainnet
scripts.generate-goerli: yarn create-generated:goerli && yarn codegen:demix-goerli && yarn build:demix-goerli
scripts.generate-avalanche: yarn create-generated:avalanche && yarn codegen:demix-avalanche && yarn build:demix-avalanche
scripts.generate-arbitrum: yarn create-generated:arbitrum && yarn codegen:demix-arbitrum && yarn build:demix-arbitrum
scripts.generate-optimism: yarn create-generated:optimism && yarn codegen:demix-optimism && yarn build:demix-optimism
scripts.generate-cronos: yarn create-generated:cronos && yarn codegen:demix-cronos && yarn build:demix-cronos
scripts.generate-fantom: yarn create-generated:fantom && yarn codegen:demix-fantom && yarn build:demix-fantom
scripts.yaml:demix-chapel: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml -e chapel | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/demix-subgraph-chapel.yaml
scripts.yaml:demix-bsc: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml -e bsc | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/demix-subgraph-bsc.yaml
scripts.yaml:demix-xdai: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml -e xdai | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/demix-subgraph-xdai.yaml
scripts.yaml:demix-matic: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml -e matic | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/demix-subgraph-matic.yaml
scripts.yaml:demix-mainnet: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml -e mainnet | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/demix-subgraph-mainnet.yaml
scripts.yaml:demix-goerli: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml -e goerli | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/demix-subgraph-goerli.yaml
scripts.yaml:demix-avalanche: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml -e avalanche | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/demix-subgraph-avalanche.yaml
scripts.yaml:demix-arbitrum: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml -e arbitrum-one | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/demix-subgraph-arbitrum.yaml
scripts.yaml:demix-optimism: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml -e optimism | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/demix-subgraph-optimism.yaml
scripts.yaml:demix-cronos: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml -e cronos | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/demix-subgraph-cronos.yaml
scripts.yaml:demix-fantom: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml -e fantom | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/demix-subgraph-fantom.yaml
